title: Login Issue - Invalid Credentials
description: Customer reports being unable to log in despite resetting the password.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but the payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago but has not received confirmation yet.

title: Unable to Update Profile
description: Profile edit form freezes when trying to upload a new profile picture.

title: App Crashing on Startup
description: Mobile app crashes every time user tries to open the dashboard.

title: Order Not Delivered
description: Customer reports order marked as delivered but never received the package.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal Failed
description: Customer’s annual subscription did not auto-renew and access has been restricted.

title: Incorrect Invoice Amount
description: Invoice shows an overcharge of $15 compared to the quoted price.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Error
description: User unable to receive 2FA codes via SMS for account verification.

title: Coupon Code Not Working
description: Customer reports valid coupon code returns an ‘expired’ message.

title: Delay in Account Activation
description: Newly registered account has been pending activation for more than 24 hours.

title: Multiple Charges for One Order
description: Customer was charged twice for a single order and requests immediate refund.
